entry.title: PPLNS with job declaration
entry.summary: No Share is a custom datatype that has been encoded as specified in the extension specification. This implementation can be found within the source code hosted on GitHub, specifically at [this link](https://github.com/demand-open-source/share-accounting-ext/blob/281c1cbc4f9a07b21a443753a525197dc5d8e18c/src/data_types.rsL174). The implementation details and the encoding process are integral to understanding how No Share functions within this particular application context, illustrating its role and utility within the broader framework of the share-accounting extension.
